title: National Democratic Party (Egypt)
summary: The National Democratic Party (Arabic: الحزب الوطني الديمقراطي‎ Al-Ḥizb Al-Waṭanī Ad-Dīmūqrāṭī, often referred to in Arabic: الحزب الوطني‎ as the Al-Ḥizb al-Waṭaniy, or the "National Party") was the ruling political party in Egypt from 1978 to 2011. The party was founded by President Anwar El Sadat in 1978.[4]
